    • 方法详细资料

      • onAttachedToWindow

        public void onAttachedToWindow()
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        This is called when the view is attached to a window. At this point it has a Surface and will start drawing. Note that this function is guaranteed to be called before IFView.draw(Canvas), however it may be called any time before the first onDraw -- including before or after IFView.measure(int, int).
        指定者:
        onAttachedToWindow 在接口中 IFView
        覆盖:
        onAttachedToWindow 在类中 FView
        另请参阅:
        IFView.onDetachedFromWindow()

      • onDetachedFromWindow

        public void onDetachedFromWindow()
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        This is called when the view is detached from a window. At this point it no longer has a surface for drawing.
        指定者:
        onDetachedFromWindow 在接口中 IFView
        覆盖:
        onDetachedFromWindow 在类中 FView
        另请参阅:
        IFView.onAttachedToWindow()

      • measureChildWithMargins

        public void measureChildWithMargins(FView child,
                                    int parentWidthMeasureSpec,
                                    int widthUsed,
                                    int parentHeightMeasureSpec,
                                    int heightUsed)
        从接口复制的说明: FViewParent
        Ask one of the children of this view to measure itself, taking into account both the MeasureSpec requirements for this view and its padding and margins. The child must have MarginLayoutParams The heavy lifting is done in getChildMeasureSpec.
        指定者:
        measureChildWithMargins 在接口中 FViewParent
        参数:
        child - The child to measure
        parentWidthMeasureSpec - The width requirements for this view
        widthUsed - Extra space that has been used up by the parent horizontally (possibly by other children of the parent)
        parentHeightMeasureSpec - The height requirements for this view
        heightUsed - Extra space that has been used up by the parent vertically (possibly by other children of the parent)

      • onLayout

        public abstract void onLayout(boolean changed,
                              int l,
                              int t,
                              int r,
                              int b)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Called from layout when this view should assign a size and position to each of its children. Derived classes with children should override this method and call layout on each of their children.
        指定者:
        onLayout 在接口中 IFView
        覆盖:
        onLayout 在类中 FView
        参数:
        changed - This is a new size or position for this view
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

        invalidate child rect
        指定者:
        invalidateChild 在接口中 FViewParent
        参数:
        child - view for invalidate
        rect - rect for invalidate

      • addView

        public void addView(FView child)
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup

        Adds a child view. If no layout parameters are already set on the child, the default parameters for this ViewGroup are set on the child.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        指定者:
        addView 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        另请参阅:
        IFViewGroup.generateDefaultLayoutParams()

      • addView

        public void addView(FView child,
                    int index)
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Adds a child view. If no layout parameters are already set on the child, the default parameters for this ViewGroup are set on the child.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        指定者:
        addView 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        index - the position at which to add the child
        另请参阅:
        IFViewGroup.generateDefaultLayoutParams()

      • addView

        public void addView(FView child,
                    IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Adds a child view with the specified layout parameters.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        指定者:
        addView 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        params - the layout parameters to set on the child

      • addView

        public void addView(FView child,
                    int index,
                    IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Adds a child view with the specified layout parameters.

        Note: do not invoke this method from IFView.draw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas), FView.dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) or any related method.

        指定者:
        addView 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        参数:
        child - the child view to add
        index - the position at which to add the child or -1 to add last
        params - the layout parameters to set on the child

      • addViewInner

        protected void addViewInner(FView child,
                            int index,
                            IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)

      • generateDefaultLayoutParams

        public IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams generateDefaultLayoutParams()
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Returns a set of default layout parameters. These parameters are requested when the View passed to IFViewGroup.addView(FView) has no layout parameters already set. If null is returned, an exception is thrown from addView.
        指定者:
        generateDefaultLayoutParams 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        返回:
        a set of default layout parameters or null

      • checkLayoutParams

        protected boolean checkLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams p)

      • generateLayoutParams

        protected IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams generateLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams p)
        Returns a safe set of layout parameters based on the supplied layout params. When a ViewGroup is passed a View whose layout params do not pass the test of #checkLayoutParams(FLayoutParams), this method is invoked. This method should return a new set of layout params suitable for this ViewGroup, possibly by copying the appropriate attributes from the specified set of layout params.
        参数:
        p - The layout parameters to convert into a suitable set of layout parameters for this ViewGroup.
        返回:
        an instance of FLayoutParams or one of its descendants

      • getChildCount

        public int getChildCount()
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Returns the number of children in the group.
        指定者:
        getChildCount 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        返回:
        a positive integer representing the number of children in the group

      • getChildAt

        public FView getChildAt(int index)
        从接口复制的说明: IFViewGroup
        Returns the view at the specified position in the group.
        指定者:
        getChildAt 在接口中 IFViewGroup
        参数:
        index - the position at which to get the view from
        返回:
        the view at the specified position or null if the position does not exist within the group

      • dispatchDraw

        protected void dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        从类复制的说明: FView
        Called by draw to draw the child views. This may be overridden by derived classes to gain control just before its children are drawn (but after its own view has been drawn).
        覆盖:
        dispatchDraw 在类中 FView
        参数:
        canvas - the canvas on which to draw the view

      • findViewTraversal

        public FView findViewTraversal(int id)
        覆盖:
        findViewTraversal 在类中 FView
        参数:
        id - the id of the view to be found
        返回:
        the view of the specified id, null if cannot be found

      • isTouchInView

        public boolean isTouchInView(float x,
                             float y)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        坐标是否在view内部
        指定者:
        isTouchInView 在接口中 IFView
        覆盖:
        isTouchInView 在类中 FView
        参数:
        x - 触摸事件的x坐标
        y - 触摸事件的y坐标
        返回:
        true: 在内部，可做点击或其他事件 false: 不在，不处理

      • dispatchTouchEvent

        public boolean dispatchTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Pass the touch screen motion event down to the target view, or this view if it is the target.
        指定者:
        dispatchTouchEvent 在接口中 IFView
        覆盖:
        dispatchTouchEvent 在类中 FView
        参数:
        event - The motion event to be dispatched.
        返回:
        True if the event was handled by the view, false otherwise.
